full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT C USTICE Form approved Immigration and Naturalization .ce OMB No. 43-R423 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT (ANSWER ALL ITEMS: FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) I, Kamille Lathi Mane residing at 386 Conley (Name) (Street and number) Porterville Calif 93257 U.S.A (City) (State) (ZIP Code, if in U.S.) (Country) being duly sworn depose and say: 1. I was born on 7.26.33 at Harigaon India Also, answer either a, b or c, as appro- (Date) (City) (Country) priate, if you are not a native born United States citizen. (a) If a United States citizen through naturalization, give number of certificate of naturalization No. 9561143 on March 30, 1973 (b) If a United States citizen through parent(s) or marriage, give number of own certificate of citizenship If none obtained, attach statement explaining how citizenship derived. (c) If an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, give 'A' number 2. That I am 42years of age and have resided in the United States since Sept 1960. . 3. That this affidavit is executed in behalf of the following person(s) at present residing at 34 Noanett Rd. Needham, Mass. 02912 : NAME SEX AGE COUNTRY OF BIRTH MARRIED OR RELATIONSHIP TO SINGLE DEPONENT Govindram T. Lathi m 72 India Married father Ayodhabai G. Lathi F 67 India married mother 4. (Amounts shown in answer to this question must be in United States dollars.) (a) That I am employed as, or engaged in the business of Staff Psychologist with Portensille State Hospital (Name of concern) at Portenville, Calif and derive a net annual income of $12,000 00 (b) That I have on deposit in savings (Address) 00 banks in this country $6000 - (c) That I have other personal property, the reasonable value of which is $ - (d) That I have stocks and bonds in the amount of $ - , market value, as indicated on attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (e) That I own real estate at Diamond Bar, Calif valued at $40,000 with mortgages or other encumbrances there- on amounting to $23,000 (f) That I have life insurance in the sum of $ - , cash surrender value of $ - (g) That if self-employed, I attach a copy of my last income tax return or report of commer- cial rating concern which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (See reverse side for nature of evidence of net worth to be submitted) 5. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place a check in the appropriate column to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.) NAME OF PERSON WHOLLY PARTIALLY DEPENDENT AGE DEPENDENT RELATIONSHIP TO ME None Form 1-134 (Rev. 5-31-72) N
